info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on OpenId Connect Provider entity associated with your Azure API Management deployment. API Management allows you to access APIs secured with token from [OpenID Connect Provider ](http://openid.net/connect/) to be accessed from the Developer Console.

put.description: Creates or updates the OpenID Connect Provider.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ApiManagementCreateOpenIdConnectProvider.request:
PUT https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/apimService1/openidConnectProviders/templateOpenIdConnect3?api-version=2017-03-01 HTTP/1.1
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Content-Length: 142
Content-Type: application/json
accept-language: en-US
x-ms-client-request-id: 3fb3b737-7f00-449a-848d-b24560bc0353
host: management.azure.com
Connection: close

{"properties":{"displayName":"templateoidprovider3","metadataEndpoint":"https://oidprovider-template3.net","clientId":"oidprovidertemplate3"}}
ApiManagementCreateOpenIdConnectProvider.curl:
curl -X PUT 'https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/apimService1/openidConnectProviders/templateOpenIdConnect3?api-version=2017-03-01' \
-H 'authorization: bearer <token>' \
-H 'Content-Length: 142' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'accept-language: en-US' \
-H 'x-ms-client-request-id: 3fb3b737-7f00-449a-848d-b24560bc0353' \
-d @- << EOF
{
  "properties": {
    "displayName": "templateoidprovider3",
    "metadataEndpoint": "https://oidprovider-template3.net",
    "clientId": "oidprovidertemplate3"
  }
}
EOF
